notes_translated.fr: Ce tableau contient 11685 séries, avec des données pour les années 1997 - 2011 (il n'y a pas nécessairement de données pour toutes les années pour l'ensemble des combinaisons), et sa dernière date de diffusion remonte au 2013-05-15. Ce tableau contient des données telles que décrites par les dimensions suivantes (les combinaisons ne sont pas toutes disponibles) : Géographie (15 éléments : Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador; Île-du-Prince-Édouard; Nouvelle-Écosse; Canada ...), Secteur (3 éléments : Ensemble de l'économie; Secteur des entreprises; Secteur non commercial ...), Mesures de productivité du travail et variables connexes (15 éléments : Nombre total d'emplois; Nombre d'emplois salariés; Heures travaillées pour tous les emplois; Nombre d'emplois occupés par des travailleurs autonomes ...), Système de classification des industries de l'Amérique du Nord (SCIAN) (19 éléments: Ensemble des industries; Agriculture; foresterie; pêche et chasse ...).
notes_translated.en: This table contains 11685 series, with data for years 1997 - 2011 (not all combinations necessarily have data for all years), and was last released on 2013-05-15. This table contains data described by the following dimensions (Not all combinations are available): Geography (15 items: Newfoundland and Labrador; Canada; Nova Scotia; Prince Edward Island ...), Sector (3 items: Total economy; Non-business sector; Business sector ...), Labour productivity measures and related measures (15 items: Total number of jobs; Number of employee jobs; Number of self-employed jobs; Hours worked for all jobs ...), North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) (19 items: All industries; Agriculture; forestry; fishing and hunting ...).

fr: gains et salaires selon la profession l'industrie ou le secteur
heures de travail et conditions de travail
en: earnings and wages by occupation industry or sector
hours of work and work arrangements

subject: economics_and_industry
labour

title_translated.en: Labour statistics consistent with the System of National Accounts, by sector, job category and North American Industry Classification System (NAICS), S-level aggregation

notes: This table contains 11685 series, with data for years 1997 - 2011 (not all combinations necessarily have data for all years), and was last released on 2013-05-15. This table contains data described by the following dimensions (Not all combinations are available): Geography (15 items: Newfoundland and Labrador; Canada; Nova Scotia; Prince Edward Island ...), Sector (3 items: Total economy; Non-business sector; Business sector ...), Labour productivity measures and related measures (15 items: Total number of jobs; Number of employee jobs; Number of self-employed jobs; Hours worked for all jobs ...), North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) (19 items: All industries; Agriculture; forestry; fishing and hunting ...).
title: Labour statistics consistent with the System of National Accounts, by sector, job category and North American Industry Classification System (NAICS), S-level aggregation
